explanation: The home function handles both GET and POST requests at the root path.
It utilizes the MessageForm class to validate user input for creating a new blog post.
Upon successful submission, it adds the new entry to the database and redirects the user.
response.hook: Explore how the home route processes user input.
response.pitfall: Ensure proper validation to avoid database errors.
response.title: Home Route Handling
response.why_it_matters: Understanding this route is crucial for managing user interactions and data submission in the application.
